interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Godefroy Tint Kit for Spot Coloring, Dark Brown
Review Date: 2016/07/04
Store: Godefroy
Product Description: ['Godefroy Professional Hair Color Tint Kit is ideal for coloring small areas of the scalp and facial hair. Pre-measured in separate capsule units, it gives you the versatility to use the exact amount of color with no waste. Great for use on beards, mustaches, sideburns, & temple, anywhere you need a little color. Also can be used for root touch ups in between hair color treatments. No odor & Blends well with existing color']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Color': 'Dark Brown', 'Brand': 'Godefroy', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 2.5 x 2.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '203', 'UPC': '852661595933 604106323737 186297000067 726714358472 801276566487', 'Manufacturer': 'Godefroy'}
Review Text: Really worth the buy, my eyebrows are black and this color is perfect. This product really helps out if you are trying to grow out your natural eyebrows.
Review Title: Great product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Must Up
['Correct Massage Techniques: Step 1: Spread the cream to the breast all around. Step 2: The body slightly to bend down, both hands pat the breast base, and upwardly pushes 10 times of each. Step 3: Pushes from the armpit to the cleavage 10 times of each. Step 4: With the middle finger and the ring finger, pulls several times of the chest ligament, is helpful to strength the breast and enhancement. Tips : 1) During the first week of using, massage twice a day in the morning and at night. 2) It is more effective to use the cream after taking a bath. 3) When your bust becomes fuller, remember to wear bras that fit and massage your bust every day.']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Category**: The user continues to express strong enthusiasm for hair extensions, particularly favoring diverse color and texture options like ombre styles. Their interest in body enhancement products remains significant, complemented by a growing focus on hair coloring solutions.

- **Preferences**: The user prioritizes high-quality, thicker extensions made from natural materials and effectively uses coloring products for targeted areas, ensuring practicality and precision. They appreciate effective moisturization in skincare, valuing practical benefits over enhancement effects.

- **Hair Type**: Engages with products suited for various hair types, including wavy, curly, oily, dry, and normal textures, along with tools for precise coloring applications.

- **Review Behavior**: The user provides thoughtful feedback, praising strengths such as thickness and versatility while addressing common issues like tangling. Their ratings reflect an appreciation for products that deliver reliable results, whether in extensions or spot coloring.

- **Trends**: Actively seeks diverse color options for hair extensions and coloring products, showcasing a commitment to enhancing personal beauty with an eye toward practical solutions.

- **Quality Criteria**: Values high-quality, thick hair extensions and effective skincare and hair coloring solutions, recognizing common product challenges and prioritizing tangible outcomes.

- **Overall Attitude**: Maintains a positive outlook towards new purchases, demonstrating a willingness to experiment with different beauty and personal care products, favoring those that effectively meet practical needs.
